column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Update: I sent the review to the link you provided
column2: thank you.   But I also want to mention this Yelp page has special hours: CLOSED.  And still says that today.  I had to call to check that this location was open and not closed like it said
column3: which it was open. I told the staff on the phone about the Yelp hours but staff didn't say like "we'll look into it" or even comment on it.
